<a href="https://weblate.org/"><img alt="Weblate" src="https://s.weblate.org/cdn/Logo-Darktext-borders.png" height="80px" /></a>

**Weblate is libre software web-based continuous localization system,
used by over 2500 libre projects and companies in more than 165 countries.**

# Weblate Fonts Collection

Fonts used in Weblate.

[![Website](https://img.shields.io/badge/website-weblate.org-blue.svg)](https://weblate.org/)
[![CII Best Practices](https://bestpractices.coreinfrastructure.org/projects/552/badge)](https://bestpractices.coreinfrastructure.org/projects/552)
[![PyPI package](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/weblate-fonts.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/weblate-fonts/)

## PIP Installation

Install using pip:

```console
pip3 install weblate-fonts
```

Sources are available at <https://github.com/WeblateOrg/fonts>.
